reviewText: Amazing, best I have seen next to Art of Flight.  Love the music and the way it is filmed.  My son loves to watch it and it is also a great movie to have on in the background during a party.

The snowboarding is top notch, some excellent tricks going on throughout the movie. However, I hated the music and I ended up turning off the volume and playing my own tunes. Others might like it but if the music is not good, and there is no talking only music, it ruins the vid for me.
I love this video, it is my all time absolute favorite!  The quality is great and so is the soundtrack!
